LedgerX | New York, NY (NYC) | Full-time | Onsite https://ledgerx.com/careers

We are the first US-based CFTC-approved exchange and clearinghouse for physically-settled bitcoin derivatives. We have been operating since October 2017 and are growing fast. We currently only allow eligible contract participants (institutional investors and/or high net worth individuals). It's a really interesting opportunity to work on a vertically-scaling product for a pool of very sophisticated customers.

* Senior Frontend Engineer

Work with our designer to build out our social trading platform. Our customers love the virtual trading pit we've built, and we're looking to extend it into a totally new type of trading interface. React/Redux.

* Digital Assets Engineer (Bitcoin, Ethereum)

Build, maintain and test various integrations with digital assets. Assist with the development, improvement and training around custody procedures. Strong Python and SQLAlchemy skills required.

Health/dental/vision included.
